    • Uses of Mouse in com.github.maxstupo.flatengine

      Methods in com.github.maxstupo.flatengine that return Mouse 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Mouse FlatEngine.getMouse()
      Returns the mouse handler, this object allows checking if mouse buttons are pressed or gettting the position of the mouse cursor.

      protected Mouse AbstractNode.getMouse()
